value: Hey, we dealt with that dwarf issue.
The one you told us to take care of. Bloodthirsty dwarves and such, remember?
No idea what you are talking about.
Carl, please, you are really getting on my nerves.
I'm not Carl. That guy was kicked out a few days ago.
Argh... Whatever. We've dealt with dwarves, now let us pass. We had an agreement.
Look, I don't know anything about the agreement. And Iâ€™m only seeing you for the first time.
You are free to pass through. No idea what that moron Carl said to you, but the entrance is free.
It's all good, we can enter the city now, right?
That bastard was really lucky his face was hidden by a helmet.
